mapper.sql: meeting.id as meeting_id, meeting.start_time as meeting_start_time, meeting.end_time as meeting_end_time, meeting.meeting_room_id as meeting_meeting_room_id, meeting.record_status as meeting_record_status, meeting.creator_account as meeting_creator_account, meeting.created_time as meeting_created_time, meeting.modifier_account as meeting_modifier_account, meeting.modified_time as meeting_modified_time, meeting.participants_str as meeting_participants_str, meeting.applicant as meeting_applicant, meeting.application_time as meeting_application_time, meeting.sign_in_QR as meeting_sign_in_QR, meeting.wechat_remind as meeting_wechat_remind, meeting.message_remind as meeting_message_remind, meeting.pc_remind as meeting_pc_remind, meeting.app_remind as meeting_app_remind, meeting.is_remind as meeting_is_remind, meeting.title as meeting_title, meeting.meeting_status as meeting_meeting_status,meeting.organizational_user as meeting_organizational_user,meeting.file_url

meeting.id AS meeting_id, date_format(meeting.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS meeting_start_date, date_format(meeting.start_time,'%k:%i') AS meeting_start_time, date_format(meeting.end_time,'%k:%i') AS meeting_end_time, meeting.meeting_room_id AS meeting_meeting_room_id, meeting.record_status AS meeting_record_status, meeting.creator_account AS meeting_creator_account, meeting.created_time AS meeting_created_time, meeting.modifier_account AS meeting_modifier_account, meeting.modified_time AS meeting_modified_time, meeting.participants_str AS meeting_participants_str, meeting.applicant AS meeting_applicant, meeting.application_time AS meeting_application_time, meeting.sign_in_QR AS meeting_sign_in_QR, meeting.wechat_remind AS meeting_wechat_remind, meeting.message_remind AS meeting_message_remind, meeting.pc_remind AS meeting_pc_remind, meeting.app_remind AS meeting_app_remind, meeting.is_remind AS meeting_is_remind, meeting.title AS meeting_title, meeting.meeting_status AS meeting_meeting_status, u.NAME AS userName, o.NAME AS organizationalUserName, o.department_name AS organizationalDepartmentName, meetingroom.meetingroom_id, meetingroom.name as meetingRoomName, meetingroom.name as meetingroom_name, meetingroom.building as meetingroom_building, meetingroom.floor as meetingroom_floor, meetingroom.room_number as meetingroom_room_number, meetingroom.position as meetingroom_position, tc.content as content, (CASE meeting.meeting_status
WHEN 0 THEN '待开始' WHEN 1 THEN '进行中' WHEN 2 THEN '已完成' WHEN 3 THEN '已取消' END)meetingStatusMessage ,meeting.file_url
mapper.update:
update tb_oa_meeting set record_status = 0, modifier_account=#{account}, modified_time = now() where id in
#{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT meeting.id AS meeting_id, meeting.start_time AS meeting_start_date, meeting.start_time AS meeting_start_time, meeting.end_time AS meeting_end_time, meeting.meeting_room_id AS meeting_meeting_room_id, meeting.record_status AS meeting_record_status, meeting.creator_account AS meeting_creator_account, meeting.created_time AS meeting_created_time, meeting.modifier_account AS meeting_modifier_account, meeting.modified_time AS meeting_modified_time, meeting.participants_str AS meeting_participants_str, meeting.applicant AS meeting_applicant, meeting.application_time AS meeting_application_time, meeting.sign_in_QR AS meeting_sign_in_QR, meeting.wechat_remind AS meeting_wechat_remind, meeting.message_remind AS meeting_message_remind, meeting.pc_remind AS meeting_pc_remind, meeting.app_remind AS meeting_app_remind, meeting.is_remind AS meeting_is_remind, meeting.title AS meeting_title, meeting.meeting_status AS meeting_meeting_status, o.NAME AS organizationalUserName, o.department_name AS organizationalDepartmentName, o.departmentId as organizationalId, o.id as organizationalUserId, u.`NAME` as userName, meetingroom.meetingroom_id, meetingroom.NAME AS meetingroom_name, meetingroom.building AS meetingroom_building, meetingroom.floor AS meetingroom_floor, meetingroom.room_number AS meetingroom_room_number, meetingroom.position AS meetingroom_position, tc.content AS content,meeting.file_url FROM tb_oa_meeting meeting LEFT JOIN ( SELECT c.meeting_id, c.content FROM tb_oa_meeting_content c WHERE c.record_status != 0 ) tc ON tc.meeting_id = meeting.id
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m.id AS meetingroom_id, m.NAME, m.building, m.floor, m.room_number, m.position FROM tb_oa_meeting_room m WHERE m.record_status != 0 ) meetingroom ON meetingroom.meetingroom_id = meeting.meeting_room_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t.id, t.NAME, t.account, tt.department_name, tt.id as departmentId FROM tb_sys_user t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t1.user_id, t2.department_name, t2.id FROM tb_sys_user_department_post t1 INNER JOIN tb_sys_department t2 ON t1.department_id = t2.id WHERE t1.is_default = 1 AND t1.record_status = 1 AND t2.record_status = 1 ) tt ON t.id = tt.user_id WHERE t.record_status = 1 ) o ON meeting.organizational_user = o.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tu.id, tu.NAME, tu.account FROM tb_sys_user tu WHERE tu.record_status = 1 ) u ON meeting.applicant = u.id WHERE 1=1 and meeting.id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT meetingparticipants.id AS id, meetingparticipants.meeting_id AS meetingId, meetingparticipants.meeting_user_id AS meetingUserId, u.name as userName, u.account FROM tb_oa_meeting_participants meetingparticipants
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t.id, t.NAME, t.account
FROM tb_sys_user t where t.record_status=1 )u on u.id =meetingparticipants.meeting_user_id WHERE meetingparticipants.record_status != 0
and meetingparticipants.meeting_id=#{id}

select
FROM tb_oa_meeting meeting
where ( meeting.meeting_status =0 or meeting.meeting_status =1)
and meeting.meeting_room_id =#{meetingRoomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND ( (meeting.start_time <#{startTime}and #{startTime}<meeting.end_time) or (meeting.start_time <#{endTime}and #{endTime}<meeting.end_time) OR ((meeting.start_time =#{startTime})OR( #{endTime}=meeting.end_time) ) )

SELECT t.id AS meeting_id, tt.phone AS applicantPhone, tt.wechat_account AS applicantWechatAccount, t.title AS meeting_title, t.meetingRoomName FROM ( SELECT round( ( UNIX_TIMESTAMP( meeting.start_time ) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP( NOW( ) ) ) / 60 ) AS sub_time, meeting.start_time, meeting.applicant, meeting.id, meeting.title, meetingroom.name as meetingRoomName FROM tb_oa_meeting meeting left JOIN ( select r.name ,r.id from tb_oa_meeting_room r )meetingroom on meetingroom.id = meeting.meeting_room_id
WHERE meeting.is_remind is null ) t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t.id, t.phone, t.wechat_account FROM tb_sys_user t WHERE t.record_status = 1 ) tt ON tt.id = t.applicant where t.sub_time>=0 and t.sub_time<=12
